metadata.name: Github Fork Private Repositories Setting Enabled/Cleared
metadata.comment: Detects when the policy allowing forks of private and internal repositories is changed (enabled or cleared).

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM vulnerability_finding WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(LOWER(action)) in ('private_repository_forking\.clear', 'private_repository_forking\.enable'))

output.summary: Detects when the policy allowing forks of private and internal repositories is changed (enabled or cleared).

metadata.objective: False positive: Allowed administrative activities. Reference: https://docs.github.com/en/enterprise-cloud@latest/admin/monitoring-activity-in-your-enterprise/reviewing-audit-logs-for-your-enterprise/audit-log-events-for-your-enterprise#private_repository_forking
